name: Gap between men and women in professional jobs (Blau and Kahn (2017))
description: This variable is calculated as % men minus % women in professional jobs. The sample – from PSID PSID (Michigan Panel Study of Income Dynamics) – includes full time non-farm wage and salary workers ages 25–64 with at least twenty-six weeks of employment.
datasetName: Incidence of managerial or professional jobs and collective-bargaining by gender - Blau and Kahn (2017)

source.name: Blau and Kahn (2017)
source.dataPublishedBy: Blau, Francine D., and Lawrence M. Kahn (2017). "The Gender Wage Gap: Extent, Trends, and Explanations." Journal of Economic Literature, 55(3): 789-865.
source.dataPublisherSource: Blau and Kahn's calculations based on data from the PSID (Michigan Panel Study of Income Dynamics)
source.additionalInfo: See the authors' data appendix for more detail on how the data was prepared and analyzed.
